title: Ep116: Arras Air War - Over the Top!
itunes:title: Ep116: Arras Air War - Over the Top!
description:
The attack has begun! After following the air war over Arras from its earliest days, Pete and Gary now tell the story of the opening phase of this huge battle, on April 9, 1917.


Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain

Publisher: Mat McLachlan

Producer: Jess Stebnicki


Support the show with a one-off donation: www.buymeacoffee.com/pgmh
